sub_title: Senior Writer @ New Weekly Magazine/Phoenix New Media Ltd./GQ | Research and Publishing
summary: Professional freelance writer with eight years of experience in public communication and content marketing, offering a wealth of knowledge and skills from extensive content creation for high-traffic multimedia platforms. Proficiency in writing spans a broad array of topics, with a particular focus on China-related events. Robust research skills ensure the independent completion of assigned projects and tasks.
